verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adyantha rahithudavagu maajyothi Medini prabhoo nin stutintumu Medini prabhoo nin stutintumu Naa deena kaaparee neetti krupaa Nidhee shuddha divya gaatrudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manoharamagu nee krupanu pondanu Maanavu lellaramu cheritimi Maanavu lellaramu cheritimi Aatma roopaa krupaamayaa Nee karunaa varamula maa keeyumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paalache kaduga badina dhavalaakshudaa Valli poola yandu thirugu vaadaa Valli poola yandu thirugu vaadaa Shaalemu raajaa sharonu rojaa Shaanta bhoopathivi neeve{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lakshala dootala stutula nandu vaadaa Akshaya hema makuta dhaarudaa Akshaya hema makuta dhaarudaa Hema kireeta dhaarulamai Swargambu chera kadavari varshamee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kroththa yerooshalem nagara raajaa Ratnaala punaadi vesitivi Ratnaala punaadi vesitivi Dheeratha tho nee saakshamu chaatanu Stiramagu naatma nimmu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shrestu laaraa paavurmaa nirupa maana Istampu roopa laavanya vathee Istampu roopa laavanya vathee Atlanchu pilchu divya dwaniki Mamu paatrulugaa cheyumaa{/lang-eng}
